price: 51. And indeed, We have destroyed your likes; then is there any that will remember (or receive admonition)?
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَآ أَشۡيَاعَكُمۡ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: walaqad ahlaknā ashyāʿakum fahal min muddakirin
